14th December 2023 - New board appointments announced for Sydney Harbour Federation Trust
6th May 2023 - Sydney Harbour to receive $45 million for repair and conservation following ‘decade of neglect’
6th March 2023 - AI technology pilot program deployed to help clean up Sydney Harbour

27th May 2021 - Seabin Project partners with Coca-Cola to tackle Sydney Harbour’s marine pollution
13th November 2014 - Pacific Island leaders sail into Sydney Harbour with call to protect oceans
21st February 2013 - Sydney Harbour named a ‘National Landscape’
